tool.name: BoxResidues
tool.description: This class sets the center and the size of a rectangular parallelepiped box around a set of residues.

param.name: input_pdb_path
param.help: PDB protein structure for which the box will be build. Its size and center will be set around the 'resid_list' property once mapped against this PDB

param.name: outname_output_pdb_path
param.help: PDB including the annotation of the box center and size as REMARKs

param.name: config_json
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax
